DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety paclitaxel liposome injection carboplatin compare gemcitabine carboplatin first-line therapy advance squamous cell carcinoma lung .
DOC.brief_title: Lipusu Advanced Squamous Cell Carcinoma Lung Study Carboplatin Advanced Squamous Cell Carcinoma Lung
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety paclitaxel liposome injection carboplatin compare gemcitabine carboplatin first-line therapy advance squamous cell carcinoma lung . This study Superiority Trial .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1875 year old , gender ; 2 . ECOG : 01 ; 3 . Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis squamous nonsmallcell lung cancer ( stage IIIB IV ) ; 4 . No prior chemotherapy , biological therapy immunotherapy ; subject recurrence metastasis 6 month end chemotherapy , gemcitabine paclitaxel ; 5 . At least one radiographically measurable assessable lesion chest CG accord RECIST1.1 ( response evaluation criterion solid tumor ) ; regional lymph node metastasis may also measure assessed imaging ( mediastinal lymph node ) ; 6 . Life expectancy least 12 week ; 7 . Before treatment , blood test biochemical measurement must meet following criterion : White blood cell count ( WBC ) ≥ 4.0*109/L ; Neutrophil count ( ANC ) ≥ 2.0*109/L ; Platelet count ( PLT ) ≥ 100*109/L ; Hemoglobin ( Hb ) ≥ 100g/L ; Hepatic function : serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time upper normal limit , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≤ 2.5 time upper normal limit ; Renal function : creatinine ≤ 1.5 time upper normal limit ; 8 . Signed informed consent . 1 . Hypersensitivity reaction interventional drug ; 2 . Pregnant breastfeeding ; 2 .
